Ms. PETTERSEN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Jayden DeGroot  for earning the Arvada Wheat Ridge Service Ambassadors for Youth Award.

Jayden has overcome many challenges along his journey to success,  demonstrating perseverance…

Jayden has overcome many challenges along his journey to success,  demonstrating perseverance…

…Shriya Kapavarapu, Quade Kelley, Alper Keskinturk, Rohan       Khanna, Jason Khauv, Yena Kim, Jacob Kim, Claire Kim, Na       Young Kim, Yeonwoo Kim, Edric Kim, Paul Kim, Jayden Kim, Tony       Kim, Irene Kim, Eunchan Kim, Minjae Kim, Naomi Kim, Joseph       Kim, Sungmin Kim, Sophie Kim, Ryan Kim, Brian Kim, Hannah       Kim, Chase Kim, Noah Kim, Taylor…

…and live dairy cattle, and presented oral  justifications for their decisions. The Manor FFA team earned an  overall silver ranking. Katie Charles received a gold ranking, Jayden  Buck and Grace Shaielby received silver, and Lillian Walborn received  bronze.

The Manor FFA entered the 98th National Convention FFA with accolades  and left with even more.…

Mr. WESTERMAN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize an exceptional  young leader from my district, Jayden Coffey, a student at Cass Job  Corps in Franklin County, Arkansas, and the latest recipient of the  Westerman Award--a quarterly honor given to students who demonstrate  outstanding…

…trophy to their cabinet. What a remarkable  achievement.

I congratulate and thank Coach Thomas; the relay squad, Ricardo  Brooks, Armani Ramirez-Sperle, Vijay Carrier, and Jayden Thomas; and  everyone who played a part in this remarkable season. They have made  their school and the Sierra Vista community incredibly proud.

Congratulations to the Colts.…
